mn139:3.1: This is adapted from the first sermon; text has _kāmasukhamanuyuñjeyya_ which is a breifer expression that the original _kāmesu kāmasukhallikānuyogo_ ([sn56.11:2.3]()).
mn139:3.9: _Samañña_ (“label”) ought not be confused with _sāmañña_ (“agreement”) which is from a different root.
mn139:12.4: Most of these words are likely of Dravidian or Munda derivation.
